name: Sleep Shift
description:
Break into the dreams of megacorporation's and rob them in their sleep. 

team up with other thieves and circumvent the tight security using a variety of tools such as tasers, foam darts, and bricks, mostly bricks. Everything is connected and cutting the power to laser gates is just a effective as climbing through a window. but while you're still trying to crack the safe code, someone may be watching you through the cameras...

while you may team up with other thieves, some may choose to play against you. using the very same security system the thieves are cracking open, the Head Of Security can command the fleet of motion trackers, gates, guards, and cameras to stop the thieves at all costs.
